short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get to the point fast with GTTP — your ultimate solution for time-effective consumption of content on YouTube!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Get to the Point!" Your time is precious, so why waste it sifting through lengthy YouTube videos? With GTTP, you will say goodbye to endless scrolling and hello to fast access to the information you need.

After installing this extension, you will get the GTTP pane right under the video in YouTube. One click of a button and voilà! You're whisked away to gttp.ai, where the video transcript awaits.

Search for terms and see them color-coded in the transcript, with timestamps sorted based on relevance. With adjustable context sizes, you'll gain a comprehensive understanding of where the terms appear together. Click on a timestamp and view the video at that position right from inside GTTP!

GTTP is multilingual, so that all of its features are likely to work for videos in your language. And GTTP is free. Because your time is precious, even when on YouTube.
